title: [GAMEPLAY] Kennen ultimate bug
body: As before, the Kennen ultimate is invisible. You can hear the sound effect of Kennen "charging", and the lightings hitting. The range however, is invisible, which makes it rather hard/annoying to play against.

replies.body:
Hiya! 

We're currently in the process of running compatibility tests on Kennen and his skins. This isn't something that occurs all the time, which makes tracking down a repro/fix a bit harder than usual. Thanks for the report! ^-^
I just played against a Kennen. His ult was perfectly visible to me...
Same thing here. Probably only with one of his skins. Which one I do not remember... When I played against him last night, it was invisibile - Might be fixed already?
